name: Tusk
title: Ymir
lore: A brawler from the frozen tundra, Tusk uses ice and his fists to punch enemies into submission.

iceShards.name: Ice Shards
iceShards.description: Launches shards of ice that damage enemies and create a barrier.

snowball.name: Snowball
snowball.description: Rolls towards an enemy in a snowball, gathering allies along the way. Stuns on impact.

tagTeam.name: Tag Team
tagTeam.description: Creates an aura that causes attacks on slowed enemies to deal bonus damage.

walrusPunch.name: Walrus PUNCH!
walrusPunch.description: Tusk's next attack launches the target into the air, dealing critical damage.
